outline:
1. thought, device
    1. thought
    2. device, plan, purpose
    3. invention
kjv_def: cunning (work), curious work, device(-sed), imagination, invented, means, purpose, thought.
strongs_def: a contrivance, i.e. (concretely) a texture, machine, or (abstractly) intention, plan (whether bad, a plot; or good, advice)
